mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_no, team_name, email, employee_name, pw, position_id, image_url) values(#{employee_no}, #{team_name}, #{email}, #{employee_name}, #{pw}, #{position_id}, #{image_url})
mapper.update: update employee set pw = #{pw}, image_url = #{image_url}, email = #{email}, team_name = #{team_name}, position_id = #{position_id}, last_login = #{last_login} where employee_no = #{employee_no}
